register.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters

hero.title: Train Your Brain.
hero.subtitle: Play with Purpose.
hero.description: Explore AI-powered cognitive training through strategy, focus, and fun.

cognigo.name: CogniGo (Quantum Go)
cognigo.tagline: Learn Go the AI Way: Strategic Depth Meets Quantum Thinking
cognigo.description: Experience the ancient game of Go enhanced with quantum computing principles and AI-powered learning.

fogOfWar.name: Fog of War Chess
fogOfWar.tagline: Chess in the Dark. Strategy in the Unknown.
fogOfWar.description: Master chess with limited visibility that challenges your ability to make decisions with incomplete information.

sudoku.name: Sudoku
sudoku.tagline: Strengthen logic, focus, and memory through themed Sudoku challenges.
sudoku.description: Experience new ways to play as each theme brings a unique twist to the classic puzzle.

sudokuBattle.name: SudokuBattle
sudokuBattle.description: Strike SudokuBattle puzzles with real-time multiplayer battles that test your logic and speed.

chessMaster.name: ChessMaster
chessMaster.description: Enhances working memory and logical reasoning through dynamic chess-based puzzles, thereby building individualized cognitive patterns.

chessTourmaster.name: Chess Tourmaster
chessTourmaster.tagline: Strategic Chess Adventures Across Dynamic Boards.
chessTourmaster.description: Challenge your tactical planning and adaptability with innovative chess-based puzzles set across evolving board designs.

more.name: More Games
more.description: Explore our full collection of AI-powered cognitive training games designed to enhance your mental abilities.

benefits.title: Why These Games?
benefits.subtitle: Each game targets a core cognitive skill essential for learning and development.

testimonials.title: What People Say
testimonials.subtitle: Backed by science, loved by families.

testimonial1.text: These games are scientifically designed to enhance cognitive abilities. I've seen remarkable improvement in my strategic thinking!
testimonial1.author: Dr. Sarah Chen

testimonial2.text: My kids love playing CogniGo! They're learning strategy while having fun. Their focus has improved noticeably.
testimonial2.author: Maria Rodriguez

testimonial3.text: The perfect blend of education and entertainment. These games make brain training feel like play.
testimonial3.author: James Wilson
